name: SiVola
tag_list: iphone, ios, mobile, apps, software, advertising, affiliate, apple
overview:
SiVola brings new exciting and innovative ideas into the mobile space, creating a bridge between virtual and real worlds. SiVola is formed by industry experts and seasoned professionals coming from different background to create an intriguing and creative company.

SiVola focuses on developing applications for Apple iOS devices (iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad), with plan to expand to other platforms such as Google Android. The first application brought to market, iSocialize, reached and maintained Top 2 in Apple App Store Social Networking chart across various countries, including US, and in particular overall Top 100 in US among over 400,000 applications. iSocialize reached run rate of over 20,000 new users/month, was featured by Apple as â€œAll-Time Top Paid appâ€ for 10 billionth app download campaign, and as â€œTop 10 best Social Networking appâ€ of 2010 for iTunes Rewind 2010 campaign, won â€œ2009 Best App Ever Awardâ€ in Social Networking ahead of popular Facebook iPhone application, and received extremely satisfied customer reviews on iTunes store.
